tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (PP (IN At) (NP (NN home))) (NP (JJ sick) (CC and) (NN today)) (VP (VBZ is) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN day)) (SBAR (S (NP (PRP they)) (VP (VBP decide) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB test) (NP (DT the) (NN fire) (NNS alarms)) (PP (IN in) (NP (PRP$ my) (NN apartment) (NN building)))))))))))))
